Constituent.Name: Total Dissolved Solids
Constituent.Description: SPARROW model of dissolved solids transport in the Southwestern U.S. model as described in SIR-2006-5315, except predictions unadjusted

Source.Name: Crystalline Rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from crystalline rocks.

Source.Name: Mafic volcanic rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from mafic volcanic rocks.

Source.Name: Felsic volcanic rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from felsic volcanic rocks.

Source.Name: Eugeosynclinal rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from eugeosynclinal rocks.

Source.Name: High-yield Cenozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from high-yield Cenozoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: Low-yield Cenozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from low-yield Cenozoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: High-yield Mesozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from high-yield Mesozoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: Med-yield Mesozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from medium-yield Mesozoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: Low-yield Mesozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from low-yield Mesozoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: High-yield Paleozoic sed. rock
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from high-yield Palezoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: Med-yield Paleozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from medium-yield Palezoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: Low-yield Paleozoic sed. rocks
Source.Description: Represents delivery of weathering products from low-yield Palezoic sedimentary rocks.

Source.Name: Cultivated land
Source.Description: Represents deliveries of dissolved solids resulting from human activities on cultivated land.

Source.Name: Pasture land
Source.Description: Represents deliveries of dissolved solids resulting from human activities on pasture land.

Source.Name: Imported dissolved solids
Source.Description: Represents dissolved solids imported to catchment from transbasin-imported water.

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Crystalline rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from crystalline rocks. Mafic volcanic rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from mafic volcanic rocks. Felsic volcanic rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from felsic volcanic rocks. Eugeosynclinal rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from eugeosynclinal rocks. High-yield Cenozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from high-yield Cenozoic sedimentary rocks. Low-yield Cenozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from low-yield Cenozoic sedimentary rocks. High-yield Mesozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from high-yield Mesozoic sedimentary rocks. Med-yield Mesozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from medium-yield Mesozoic sedimentary rocks. Low-yield Mesozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from low-yield Mesozoic sedimentary rocks. High-yield Paleozoic sed. rock Represents delivery of weathering products from high-yield Palezoic sedimentary rocks. Med-yield Paleozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from medium-yield Palezoic sedimentary rocks. Low-yield Paleozoic sed. rocks Represents delivery of weathering products from low-yield Palezoic sedimentary rocks. Cultivated land Represents deliveries of dissolved solids resulting from human activities on cultivated land. Pasture land Represents deliveries of dissolved solids resulting from human activities on pasture land. Imported dissolved solids Represents dissolved solids imported to catchment from transbasin-imported water.
